A4.text: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (1987 TV series), also known as Teenage Mutant Hero Turtles in Europe and UK

A5.text: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (1990 film), directed by Steve Barron

A6.text: The pilot was shown during the week of December 28, 1987, in syndication as a five-part miniseries.

A7.text: The show began its full-time run on October 1, 1988, and ended on November 2, 1996.
